# Procedure

Process diagramms as in Figure `r ref("fig:diagramr")` can easily be created using the `r rmdtemplates::cite_pkg("DiagrammeR")` Package.

```{r diagramr, echo=TRUE, fig.cap="Example"}

library(DiagrammeR)

grViz(diagram = "
      digraph boxes_and_cicrles {
      
      graph [rankdir = LR]
      
      node [shape = box
            fontname = Helvetica
            ]
      'Setup OSF Project Site'
      Test
      
      node [shape = circle]
      
      Start
      
      edge []
      
      Start->'Setup OSF Project Site';
      'Setup OSF Project Site'->Test;
      }
      "
)

```
